monitored_vectors.description: Liveness metric exceeding acceptable latency limit.
Monitors immediate post-deployment fluctuation in key utility axioms.

reason: The Manifest confirms the validity of the state transition *before* commitment. A dedicated DSE Deviation Quorum Heartbeat (DQH) component is necessary to provide real-time, post-commitment verification, actively monitoring operational metrics and utility axioms immediately following a state transition (Psi_N+1) to ensure system stability and detect immediate, unexpected divergence requiring swift rollback protocols. This configuration file defines the monitoring parameters for this critical layer.
